column4: Can I boot with a 9.10 cd and backup my whole Harddrive ? So If something goes wrong, or I really need to boot the old version again, I can just put it all back ?
search google for 'quickstart suiss army knife'
thing is, this will create a TAR, I also want to be able to browse the backup later (easily)
You just mentioned Quickstart, does this work in 7.04 ?
